name: Speaches
description: An OpenAI API-compatible server for streaming transcription (faster-whisper), translation, and speech generation (piper, Kokoro) on Runpod Serverless.

path.description: API path to proxy to the speaches server (e.g., /v1/audio/speech).

body.description: JSON request body for the speaches API.

file_url.description: A public URL to a file to be used for upload (e.g., for transcriptions).
